description:
Client for Invidious, the privacy focused YouTube front end.

Clipiousis an Android client for Invidious, the privacy focused YouTube front end.

Features:

  • Use own or public server
  • Subscription management
  • SponsorBlock + DeArrow
  • Video view/progress tracking
  • User playlists
  • Background playback
  • Live stream support
  • Android TV UI
  • Audio playback
  • Video / audio download
  • Video filtering
  • Return Youtube Dislikes
